title: Loues triumph through Callipolis Performed in a masque at court 1630. By his Maiestie with the lords, and gentlemen assisting. The inuentors. Ben. Ionson. Inigo Iones.
author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.
publisher: Printed by I[ohn] N[orton] for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Eagle and Child in Brittains-burse,
notes: The year date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
